name: Crycord
desc: A Discord Client modification with plugins. Uses BeautifulDiscord's CSS injector. Oh it's also written in Crystal!

name: asar-cr
desc: A crystal library to read from, pack into and extract from .asar archives.

name: action-accessibility
desc: Programming is for everyone. No matter what. This action helps achieve that. Uses TTS and OpenDyslexic to create alternative accessibility options on issues and PRs.

name: discord-tanki
desc: Discord Rich Presence for Tanki Online, using electron and materializeCSS

name: Granz
desc: A Discord bot/framework(?) written in crystal using discordcr

name: matrixcr
desc: A Work In Progress matrix.org API wrapper for Crystal

name: Soft & Wet
desc: Soft & Wet is a Discord Bot written in javascript. It uses advanced image manipulation to create new images from image templates in under a second!
